title: InvalidDeferredActionMode
description: Overview of the InvalidDeferredActionMode method
---

Initializes a new instance of the error message with a default message indicating that the provided deferred action mode is invalid.

<Note>
  `InvalidDeferredActionMode` extends `BaseError`, see the docs for BaseError
  for all supported methods.
</Note>

## Import

```ts
import { InvalidDeferredActionMode } from "@aa-sdk/core";
```
